com.here.platform.location.dataloader.core.caching

Class InMemoryLruCachePolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.platform.location.dataloader.core.caching.CachingPolicy
      • com.here.platform.location.dataloader.core.caching.InMemoryLruCachePolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Deprecated. 
    Use methods based on OptimizedMapLayers instead. Since SDK 2.54.

    public class InMemoryLruCachePolicy
extends CachingPolicy
    Creates LRU-based CachingDataLoaders.

    param: maxByteArrayEntryCount the maximum number of entries a CachingDataLoader may contain for the byte arrays cache level. param: maxInMemoryEntryCount the maximum number of entries a CachingDataLoader may contain for the inmemory cache level. param: maxOnTheFlyEntryCount the maximum number of entries a CachingDataLoader may contain for the on-the-fly cache level.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
